imgDesc.text:
Plumes of Purifying Light are the fragments left behind by entities of Khvarena who have used up all their strength. Only Pari such as <color=#ffe14b>Sorush</color> can <color=#ffe14b>retrieve</color> them.
Some Plumes will flee when Sorush approaches. She must successfully give chase to retrieve such Plumes.
Some other Plumes will split into many leaves when Sorush draws close. Collect all of these leaves to retrieve the complete Plume.
